intro.header: Let’s help you with your refill. Just answer a few questions and your Zealthy care team will help with your refill in 1-3 business days.

MENOPAUSE_REFILL_Q1.header: Would you like to continue with the same medication?

MENOPAUSE_REFILL_Q2.description: If not, don’t worry, your clinician will work with you to find a tailored treatment for your needs.
